content: KUNKUN is about to go globalTotal KUNKUN coin supply is: 2,500,000,000POW mining accounted for 30% ( GPU 20% CPU 10% )Virtual POW mining accounted for 40%Referral allowance for 15%Used for creating derivative works and community airdrop rewards 10%For publicity and marketing 5%POW  - GPU Algorithm: ethash Block Time: 60 SecondsBlock Reward: 250 KUNKUN  - CPU Algorithm: rx/0Block Time: 120 SecondsBlock Reward: 250 KUNKUNA brief overview of virtual miningUsing KUNKUN Coin to purchase virtual mining rigs for shopping, the purchased rigs can be resold. Mining with virtual rigs will consume the lifespan of the rigs, and virtual mining rewards are also given on a per-block basis.Practice RoomTeam reward is a extra reward besides mining reward. It will be rewarded after the normal mining reward. The team reward equals the sum of the mining rewards of all miners in the room by reward ratio, calculated every minute. The ratio has a halving mechanism. The initial ratio is 250%, then halves every 25 days by 25%, until to 25% as a floor.details: https://www.kunkun.homes/whiteBook/practiceRoomAirdrop  [have finished]Send your mining pool ID in our Discord airdrop channel, and you can receive 250 KUN daily.Discord: https://discord.gg/WTVDY8YTw7  Referral The referral bonus is a separate bonus pool and will not affect the earnings of the referred users.1 LVL: 4.2%2 LVL: 0.8%Website: https://www.kunkun.homes/Pool: https://pool.kunkun.homes/Twitter: https://twitter.com/kunkun_coinTelegram: https://t.me/+JdKumlyqy6wxZjgxDiscord: https://discord.gg/WTVDY8YTw7 CoinGecko: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/kunkun-coinExchange1: https://nonkyc.io/market/KUNKUN_USDTExchange2: https://xeggex.com/market/KUNKUN_USDT
